title: Senior Mould Designer
highlights:
Join a leading precision engineering company.
Work with cutting-edge technology.
responsibilities:
Design complex plastic injection moulds.
Collaborate with engineering teams.
Ensure designs meet quality standards.
requirements:
Degree in Mechanical Engineering or related field.
5+ years of experience in mould design.
Proficiency in CAD software.

title: QA Engineer
highlights:
Key role in quality assurance.
Opportunity for career growth.
responsibilities:
Ensure product quality standards are met.
Conduct rigorous testing and inspection.
Implement ISO 9001 standards.
requirements:
Diploma/Degree in Engineering.
Experience in QA/QC processes.
Knowledge of ISO 9001.

title: Production Supervisor
highlights:
Lead a dynamic production team.
Competitive salary package.
responsibilities:
Oversee daily production operations.
Manage production staff and schedules.
Ensure production targets are met efficiently.
requirements:
Experience in manufacturing supervision.
Strong leadership and communication skills.
Able to work shift hours.

title: Sales Manager (Automotive)
highlights:
Drive sales in the automotive sector.
Regional exposure.
responsibilities:
Drive sales growth in the automotive sector.
Build and maintain strong relationships with clients.
Identify new business opportunities.
requirements:
Proven track record in automotive sales.
Strong negotiation and presentation skills.
Fluent in English and Mandarin.

title: IT Support Specialist
highlights:
Support internal IT infrastructure.
Friendly work environment.
responsibilities:
Provide technical support to internal users.
Troubleshoot hardware and software issues.
Maintain IT infrastructure and documentation.
requirements:
Diploma in IT or Computer Science.
Experience in helpdesk support.
Knowledge of Windows OS and networking.

title: Process Technician
highlights:
Hands-on technical role.
Shift allowances provided.
responsibilities:
Set up and operate injection moulding machines.
Monitor process parameters.
Troubleshoot processing issues.
requirements:
NTC/NITEC in Precision Engineering.
Experience in injection moulding is a plus.
Willing to perform shift work.
